website_summaries.verdict: Popular style of punch mitts that will give beginners a good value and performance.
pros: Offered in six different color combinations
Slightly curved design fits the hand naturally
Foam padding is lightweight, but offers good shock-absorbing capability
Leather materials make these mitts easy to clean after a practice session
Velcro straps can be adjusted for a snug fit
cons: Doesn't deliver a high level of durability
Aimed at beginners, rather than experienced fighters

customer_reviews.title: Only for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I did return this item! I personally would not buy it again! The item did not fit my uses but may be good for a beginner in the martial arts or a child. If you have experiences in the martial arts and have a decent punch or kick this will NOT work for you. You will find your body absorbing most of the punch or kick! The next day you will be sore from all the tension you used up prepping for the blow. When using a heavy glove or pad you will notice that the glove or pad absorb the blow. I hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael G Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Great pads! Thought since all reviews were fairly recent
customer_reviews.text: Great pads! Thought since all reviews were fairly recent, they might be those great reviews folks give for free or severely discounted products. BUT... I paid the $25.99 and when they arrived, the stitching was perfect, material seemed strong and when I compared them to the Everlast Mantis pads at a local store for about $37, I would say these are equal or better. They were also very light and cushioned. I will definitely keep Sanabul in mind when shopping for boxing equipment in future and will pass along to friends. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Fitzboy

customer_reviews.title: Well made for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Useful for non-professional training. We purchased this for practicing with friends. You will need to break it in first time. Holder might feel strong punches but it makes good poppling. For the price it's not bad at all. We have been using it for over a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: To start off, I was terrified of these things at first. I bought them for my husband so he could use them with his boxing drills, and he asked if I could wear them for him to hit one day. I was sure that my hands were going to be killing me afterwards. Happily, they were actually really comfortable, and my hands and wrists were perfectly fine afterwards. The cushioning on these works great. I actually said "That's it?!" out loud when he punched them the first time. I was seriously not expecting this to be as easy to use as they were. Now I have no problems offering to help my hubby with his boxing.
customer_reviews.author: Vwelyn

customer_reviews.title: A great practice facilitator
customer_reviews.text: I am presently taking a boxing class and find these mitts to be not just invaluable but fantastic! My husband puts them on, or someone from the class, and I practice against the mitts. It's much more realistic than hitting something, and I can't tell you how much they have improved my practice. Sorry I don't have a photo because they are terrific, and I am so glad I saw them in the class on someone else and bought my own. You will be glad you did, especially if you are new to boxing like I am!!
customer_reviews.author: Drummer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for cost!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Lightweight with very strong stitching. Expect these to last a long time. Note: I did not receive a discount for my honest review, I just paid cold hard cash (well, card really). Not sure how you end up getting things at a discount to review things, but that's not me.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for extra work outside of Kung Fu class. They feel comfortable on the hand with the natural curve and ball inside to palm for extra support. Girlfriend stated they sting her hand a little when I hit them but nothing she can’t tolerate so they offer pretty good protection for the holder as well. The adjustable strap on the wrist keeps them from flying off her smaller hands too. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: SClark

customer_reviews.title: I'm just a picky person
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the picture for stains or whatever you saw on it. The white stains i have no clue what is it. I'm sure that the customer service would tell me to use towel with soap to clean it off to save my time because i have had that experience before. Other than that, it's average product to train and practice every day. You better wash your hands after holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mitts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our kids who are into TKD. For the price I expected semi-decent mitts. I was totally surprised when they arrived. They are made of high quality materials and are built to last. My kids kick, punch and elbow with all of their might and the padding in the mitts takes everything they can dish out. Really an outstanding product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Wegner

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I've used 4 different kinds of pads over the years in sparring with my trainer. These are by far the BEST for their size. It's a small surface to hit, but sturdy, and big enough. When hitting them, you feel a solid enough surface when making contact, yet just enough cushion. When wearing them taking the hits, they feel thick and your hand doesn't absorb much of the impact. Durable, comfortable, solid.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaux

customer_reviews.title: Not good for experienced boxers or mitt holders
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These are fairly cheap. Hands do sweat in them and the material inside causes them to create an odor. If you have someone who is heavy handed and punches the wrong spot you can injure yourself. After awhile my shoulders begin to hurt. No padding on the wrist (palm side). No shock absorber and not genuine leather. Bottom line: if you're just looking to exercise and not trying to get technical these can be good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: I’m a trained fighter and have competed as a pro in Muay Thai and MMA. I bought these mitts to train my fiancé because she’s been wanting to learn for self-defense and exercise purposes. I must say that I love these mitts and how they feel grip and impact wise on my wrist. my fiancé loves the feel of them too when she’s striking the pads/mitts. Great price and worth the buy if you’re looking to train or hold mitts for a partner or instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to boxing and find this pair of punching mitts to be fairly decent. Though I may be new, I can throw pretty good punches. These mitts handle well, and are comfortable. Overall, I’m happy with my purchase. The whole family puts it to good use. PROS: Great for beginners, durable, good quality, comfortable with good protection, curved design, adjustable strap for tightening CONS: Can’t think of any. It’s really a great pair of mitts.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Good mitts for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good mitts for the price. Much more comfortable than my Title brand mitts, however less of a pocket for your punches to land in so there's not always a "POP" when you make contact. Great for the gym because at this price, if they get lost or broken, I am not out $$$. However MUCH better than the mitts sold by Academy Sorts Store (Everlast/UFC). Shipping was fast and they even got delivered on a Saturday which was a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Montanez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair on black about 6 months ago and I used 5- 6 times a week for about 2 hours and I'm very please with the quality and the material of the mitts. Great to used and what I love of them it's the curve it's made form a non soft material that prevents the mitts from getting soft. I have small hands and they fit perfectly by being adjusted. I highly recommended ! Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Chayrelm

customer_reviews.title: Ok for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use at my boxing gym because the ones they have are kind of stinky. These work fine for beginners but if you are holding for someone who hits hard prepare for pain.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey O

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves to replace a pair of Everlast mitts I had a while back. The natural curve of the mitt was a nice touch, which helps your wrist stay in a neutral position and avoid getting bent back far. They took a heavy beating from my sparring partner and were still in great shape. The velcro strap was also nice and helped secure your hand in place. They were also easy to clean and get deep into the glove without trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: I feel I was given a cheap knockoff. See picture. Missing the lettering on the front. The leather and stitching seemed cheap. My gym has the exact real one and the feel is much different. Returned mine the same day.
customer_reviews.author: MSMSMS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Safe, Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These mitts are great! I got tired of using the ones available at the gym because they had gotten pretty worn. I looked around and these sounded like a good product. They definitely are! The design is comfortable and protective. Having the finger guard is great because I haven't gotten my fingers jammed since. There is a slight ball like grip that helps the mitt holder to keep the mitts on for enthusiastic punchers. The colors are great and The mitts have held up significantly well after hundreds of rounds. Also whenever I let someone else use them they often are surprised at the comfort and stability. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: YourBoxingBud

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: My kid likes them but I don't know if they'll hold-up with all the punching because of poor stitching.
customer_reviews.author: SMA

customer_reviews.title: For beginners but not for training high level or powerful strikers
customer_reviews.text: Good starter mits but not for advanced. There is no palm/wrist padding so if someone has clean or powerful punches you’re going feel it. They don’t absorb any shock. They stay on well enough and they’re light but I think that’s because they don’t have enough padding.
customer_reviews.author: CJ805

customer_reviews.title: Hard striking surface
customer_reviews.text: I bought them and they arrived with a small tear in the seams, they striking surface is hard so you need some type of gloves or padded footwear for kids (I got them to help my 9 year old train but he doesn’t like them because the surface is hard and hurts his hands/feet).
customer_reviews.author: Optimus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great pads
customer_reviews.text: Great pads. Use it for personal training and in kickboxing class. My only dock for one ⭐️ is that the straps stretch a little BUT it’s not horrible. I use it regularly and love it
customer_reviews.author: Leim808

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: I brought one to use at home since I have not been able to go to the gym and I have to say, the quality is great for the price point. It can take a punch or kick. The Sanabul brand is really good for starters out there. We also brought their beginners gloves and love it.
customer_reviews.author: David Chen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Awesome price! And the price is for a pair!
customer_reviews.text: I run a self defense school and was looking to replace some mitts. I found these and decided to give them a shot because of the price. Well I got them in and tried them right away in class. I had both men and women holding and punching them and they said it felt good. They worked great for me when I worked with them! I had no complaints and they felt good on my hands. I'll probably pick up a few more. I hope they come out with more gear, kick shields, shin pads etc.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy boxing mitts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a beginner kickboxer to participate in class without using the smelly shared ones the class offers. They are great, actually I like them more than the ones in class. Sturdy and really easy to grip with the curved shape inside.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: To Be Expected for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty much what you'd expect for under 30 bucks. It's pretty much a better feeling Everlast. The mesh hand compartment feels good but the outside material feels weird and cheap. The padding is pretty good and provides loud pop. Not bad but also nothing extraordinary.
customer_reviews.author: Christna Fredrick Kim

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: These mitts are great. I've used Fairtex, Ringside, and Everlast Mitts and these do the job. The circular puck piece on the inside is a nice little feature. Padding is good, they breathe enough. I've used these maybe 3-4x per week for the last two months and they are barely showing signs of wear. I recommend these mitts especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Rc

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner mitt work
customer_reviews.text: These are a great accessory to a beginner's boxing workout. They are comfortable for me to wear as the trainer, and not too hard that they hurt when my kid punches them. They feel really solid, like they would hold up for a long time. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for a while now but don't use that often, maybe 3 or 4 times. This last weekend while my son is training for a kickboxing tournament we did quite a bit of mitt work with these and the seam on the side just pretty much came apart. We often use the mitt's at our academy that they have had for years with a ton more use on them and they don't fall apart like these. Don't waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good/Quality Punching Mitts (for starter)
customer_reviews.text: I got these to spare with my kids, so far the mitts have delivered and haven't had any issues with comfort, actually pretty sturdy and notice the quality of the material. They are easy to clean, and quality of the material is holding up very well with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good. Maybe great.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the Mitts for a few months, but they are EXACTLY what I was looking for to replace my crappy ones from Everlast. Do NOT buy Everlast!! Durability? Well, I've only had them for 3 months. But so far, so good. Very light weight and more comfortable than my old pair. Not too hard, which makes them great for finger gouge training.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great Beginner mits/ intermediate mits if you just want to have a light session with them. These mits are very nice and durable however the strike pads are softer than expected. Still very great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I love this company
customer_reviews.text: As the owner of a martial arts school I am always looking for companies that provide GREAT SERVICE as well as GREAT PRODUCTS at a GREAT PRICE and Sanabul has been doing this for my gym. You CANNOT beat the quality, look, feel and PRICE of these mitts anywhere, even if I utilize my wholesale capabilities with other businesses these mitts still came out of top. Thank you Sanabul for giving us such an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Atlas Martial Arts

customer_reviews.title: Best Punching Mitts Around
customer_reviews.text: The quality and comfort of these gloves are what stands out to me. My wife and I use them and the kids also can use them with no issues. Make for a wonderful addition to our kickboxing classes we do online.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,Durable,Unique,
customer_reviews.text: I've got plenty of hand work with these.. Must-have and I'll recommend anyone boxing in the near future to get these..
customer_reviews.author: james taylor brown jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a UFC fighter and these are the ones we use. They are really good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and smooth transaction. A+++
customer_reviews.text: Product is made of quality material, very comfortable and durable. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Splicho1975

customer_reviews.title: Great for Therapy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a counselor and use these with my younger clients. Great for empowerment, release, and building body awareness. Super light weight and durable. Every parent, counselor, or classroom teacher should have a set.
customer_reviews.author: Nasty Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Great Price! Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a five star for the “so far” reason. I just purchased these mitts and received them two days after purchasing. I purchased these mitts for my boyfriend who teaches self-defense. His old mitts were falling apart. He absolutely Loves them!! He started training with them immediately and noticed a difference in how they absorb hits and was blown away! They are made sturdy and not cheap looking. The price is great! I would definitely purchase more products from this company to gift him with, so far!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nicole

customer_reviews.title: bad smell
customer_reviews.text: gave it 3 stars for comfort and durability, but it has a toxic plastic smell so strong I had to keep it in the trunk of my car
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Great Mitts!
customer_reviews.text: I love the material used to make this mitt. The build and quality makes these mitts stand out from other mitts; especially at this price point that doesn't hurt the bank account. Fits great on the hand with the help of the curvature structure. Great mitts and Great Customer Service!! Next on my list is there punching gloves!!!!
customer_reviews.author: manuel p.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Item was new and true to description. Received a day late but it wasn't nothing to get all Karen about.. great pair of pads... highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: SJ494

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I am an intermediate boxer have been training for a couple year. These pad are very much for a beginner. The padding is hard resulting in a punishing experience for the person holding them. The material is a cheap plastic and do not anticipating them lasting long. Honestly have not used them much because the are so poorly made. They just sit
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Better than my expensive pair
customer_reviews.text: These are better than the expensive pair I've been using. I run a martial arts school and wanted to get another pair of these and now these are my go-to pair. I love the little disk on the palm that helps the grip and the ease of slipping on and off while training.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a wide assortment of training pads before. These are not top of the line, but they are let great for any level! Good quality for the price. Durable. Comfortable. Affordable.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN C.

customer_reviews.title: I used the items 3 different times for a total ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the items 3 different times for a total of 36 min and began the separation of the strings and material. I couldn't find a link to contact the sellar or this would've​ been brought to their attention.
customer_reviews.author: Spill Teem

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Great Adjustability
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4” and 135 lbs and these mitts fit pretty well! Thank goodness for the Velcro strap that you can use to tighten the mitts onto your hands. Overall, nice, affordable mitts. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: RainX

customer_reviews.title: Good mitts
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome basic mitts. They have held up after a dozen sessions, but they aren’t made for anything other than light mitt work. I can feel a hard strikers hit flex the mitt more than a beginner striker.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product...
customer_reviews.text: Materials and everything seems great. Only practicing with my kids so can't say how durable they would be for adults, but they seem like they would hold up well under most conditions.
customer_reviews.author: P. Baugher

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Really good fit. Really good hold. Really easy to use. Really loud pop when struck properly. I am very happy with these. The fit is great and they work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Louie (Phoenix, AZ)

customer_reviews.title: Why pay for high priced brand name mitts, get this
customer_reviews.text: Best value out there. The pads are light, for tight, but have enough padding for those hard hitters. Love the padding at the tip of the mitts in case your partner doesn't slip enough and catches it on the face/head. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product to Supoort  my Beginning Daughter
customer_reviews.text: I actually think these pads are going to work out great. I have used others that were more expensive and these seem equal in comparison. I bought them to help my daughter practice, and seem great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Claus

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Was surprised.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Easy to Use. Was impressed by quality. Gives the kid a good target and a bit of a workout for yourself! I think it would fit most hands except extra large.
customer_reviews.author: Babs21

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you just cant beat these. Update - So after having this for a few months and using them at least 3 times a week, the bottom stitching on one of the pads has completely torn and come apart. I cant be mad because it was cheap. I would go with something made of leather if your going to be using them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Wai

customer_reviews.title: Boxing Mitts
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son is going through Black Belt prep classes and needed boxing mitts. He is signed up for 2nd degree Black Belt, so he will need them for a long time. He loves them and hoping he will still love them for many years. My son loves them so much that it got him more excited to go to Taekwondo classes.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: these are great - they're light weight, but durable. the black matt colour makes them look slick - and they don't slide off. the velcro strap is strong and they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Really good mits and low price!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for the price. I use them for focus mit combinations in krav maga training. They're lightweight, which is nice, but l guess there could be a little more padding to help take impact. Still, I'm very happy with this purchase and I would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Im impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Im not a martial arts or boxing trainer, but inuse these with a few clients who like to throw punches as part of our physical training session. Theyve help up very well are are comfortable to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pew pew
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner kickboxer, this is perfect. Actually, I think intermediate guys can use this too. Don't see why not. The workout depends on the coach and who's holding it. Great item and great price
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: These worked out great for us. I have a punching bag in the basement and wanted something for my kids to hit while upstairs that wouldn't be too loud. They are durable and still soft enough that the kids can hit them with bare hands and not complain about it hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great quality, love them
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They’re very durable and comfortable. Seems like they’re made from very good materials. I’ll definitely be buying more. This was a great buy. Shipped quickly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this set so we have an activity for the kids. The gloves fit well for my kids aged 9 to 14. It also fits my adult hands too. They are durable. We use them almost every day for the last 2 months and they look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Shar Z.

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.text: They are conf and seem well made. I have not used them yet however. I am a bit concerned about the padding being seemingly hard.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Howland

customer_reviews.title: Not breathable and makes your hand sweat
customer_reviews.text: There is no air flow when you put them on. Your hands start sweating and gets hot.
customer_reviews.author: SSK

customer_reviews.title: they felt pretty sturdy with good cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Just got these yesterday. I haven't had a chance to use the mitts for serious training yet, but just briefly trying them on at home for a couple minutes, they felt pretty sturdy with good cushioning. Looking forward to breaking them in and will update this review if my opinion changes.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleV

customer_reviews.title: Like the quality and color options
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my five year old to practice punching and kicking at home with Dad. He likes it. Feels like it's good quality material outside and in the padding. My hand fits very comfortably in the glove. I wish it was easier to tell Left and Right apart. Looking forward to using them for the years to come.
customer_reviews.author: LAC

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for training
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price. Practice for my boy. Hard hitter with the gloves and these mitts take the beating without hurting my hans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pads for entry level/light sparring
customer_reviews.text: Overall durable product. Protects hands very well! Could take strikes for hours and not feel fatigued.
customer_reviews.author: Bananas McMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for training
customer_reviews.text: Amazing training / punching mitts! They are easy to secure, well padded, and you do not feel the impact of the punch from them. My trainer actually liked them so much he bought a pair as well when I went to him! So UFC boxer approved!
customer_reviews.author: Olimpia Newlove

customer_reviews.title: Great mitts for the price
customer_reviews.text: We love these mitts! They have literally taken a beating and continue to hold up and absorb the impact. My boyfriend & I both use these so he has stretched them out a bit but the Velcro strap helps keep the mitt snug on my hand. I’d definitely recommend these and the price is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these! When I was taking Mixed Martial Arts ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! When I was taking Mixed Martial Arts classes my friends complimented me on them all the time. They're sturdy, solid, but slide on and off well, while still remaining on hands during use.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne E. Garand

customer_reviews.title: perfect for punching practice
customer_reviews.text: I've been learning Krav Maga and these are the same mitts my instructor uses. Now I'm able to practice at home. Exactly what I needed and arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stumpf

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for me to use with my daughters. They love having the time to learn and to push some thing lol.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good focus mitts
customer_reviews.text: Great simple focus mitts. Use them also for kicks, knees, etc as long as the person holding and hitting adapt.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Great training tools
customer_reviews.text: These work great, a. Use have for anyone that boxes Comfortable and fit well, don’t slide around on impact
customer_reviews.author: D. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mitts!! Better than any I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mitts!!! I box about 2 times a week for cardio, and use these mitts to their fullest ability! They fit very comfortable, but snug. They also have what seems to be a small round gel pad within the palm for protection! Much better than any pair of Title, Everlast, or Century mitt I've used!
customer_reviews.author: Josh D.

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints So Far
customer_reviews.text: So far only used them once. My adult son who is a trained boxer used them to train me..his mom. They're durable and look nice. He had no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Danilynn

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: These are great for sparring. We use them to practice/train our 12 year old son & 10 year old son.
customer_reviews.author: B Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my 7 year old son
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of using pillows for my 7 year old’s punches. Then these came in and my son loves it! Seem like they’ll last awhile. So far so good...
customer_reviews.author: UBuild Lenon

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PRODUCT AT THE PERFECT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: There is really nothing bad to say about these. They work great. I use them for personal training sessions as well as for my kickboxing classes. Fits perfect, great quality and at an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Q Rodson

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Get it. For younger use. Even some adults. Heavy hitters get something a bit more heavy. It’s great tho and a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Deeares

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great. For the person hitting the mitt it's a little stiff at first but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: WendyM

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves. My grandson and I have been hitting these for awhile and they hold up well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Confortable
customer_reviews.text: Sticks very good to the center of your palm, so it doesn't slide off. Good quality, and price.
customer_reviews.author: Atikutzu

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be pretty good quality. Haven't used much yet so cannot comment on durability but so far they are nice
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brytowski

customer_reviews.title: Not really
customer_reviews.text: Not the real deal,China knock off not hand made by the real people of Thailand
customer_reviews.author: Jarrid enzemer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mitts for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These Mitts are a great deal. Very well made, pretty and comfortable. Can't ask for more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: You literally cannot beat these for the price, if you are looking for mitts to use for individual practice, these are the ones for you. My only critique is that the supporting strap could be wider. Currently, it is a thin strap that wraps around the top of my wrist and feels awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: General Purpose Martial Arts Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my grand daughter and they did the job at her martial arts class.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ford

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit & just didn’t like the paper that stayed glued on the material other than that they served their purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Be

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality,lightweight striking mitts
customer_reviews.text: Love these striking mitts. Very light weight. A little stiff out of the box, but these will break in fine with our 11 and 15 year old practicing their striking. We got the black/green, very cool looking. Seems very well put together. Order delivered ahead of schedule with prime. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I just started a kickboxing class and these were half the price that I would have had to pay if I ordered them throuh the gym I’m going to. I orderd the gloves, mitts and wraps from Sanabul. I’ve only used them a few times but so far they seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: These mitts are great. I train my roommate at home and these ...
customer_reviews.text: These mitts are great. I train my roommate at home and these are great for teaching anyone basic to advanced combos. they are super light but at the same time absorb impact really well. my roommate is 250lbs and im 150lbs and I take his hard jabs and crosses with ease. these are easy to get on and off and won't feel like they're gunna slip off mid session. these mitts don't smell either, I have hour long sessions and after a year of using them they still don't smell bad. highly recommend them and all of sanubuls products.
customer_reviews.author: andrew mannino

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got for dad who has Parkinsons. Everyone in his Rock Steady Boxing class are so jealous
customer_reviews.author: vhiggins

customer_reviews.title: Light wgt. Good padding. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Good buy. Purchased for my daughter to practice her boxing. The one complaint is the gloves were a bit tight for her dad to put his hands in, but we think it just has to be broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mits for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It's my first time working with mits and it's very easy and light weight. My hand fits perfectly and it isn't hard to grip inside the mit. For punching, it's stiff enough but doesn't hurt the puncher's knuckles and wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Baluyot

customer_reviews.title: They slip off easily
customer_reviews.text: I returned these mitts as they were very uncomfortable and slip off easily - would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I picked up a pair of these to do some practice at home. They are very comfortable, sturdy and well made. Protect my hands great when taking punches. I recommend this to anyone who is looking for a reasonable pair of mits.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Narciso

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I use them for Krav Maga and got a second pair for my training partner. The communal focus mitts smell so bad, its well worth having your own set with you. Light weight, durable, comfortable, strong. Good for barehanded strikes or boxing gloves.
customer_reviews.author: ChlorineQueen

product_meta.title: Sanabul Essential Curved Boxing MMA Punching Mitts
feature_bullets: The Perfect Fit: Don’t spend months breaking in your pads. Sananbul’s punching mitts are hand moulded to fit the natural curvature of your hands
Feel the Impact, Not the Pain: Our mitts are infused with Santec Ultra Light Foam so you can absorb the hardest punches without holding extra weight

Designed to Endure: We want Sanabul gear to be a staple of your gym bag. So we make equipment that lasts. Essentials mitts are made with Performance Engineered Leather that will take thousands of hits without cracking

Made to Keep Trainers Safe: Any coach knows that holding focus mitts is serious business. Poor fits and uncomfortable grips can add up as you take more punches. Sanabul mitts use half-ball palm grips, so the gloves stay secure and you stay comfortable

Tested by Pros, Created for You: From UFC champions like Michael Bisping, to pro boxers like Mike Lee, Team Sanabul athletes demand the best. We designed our MMA mitts to hold up for expert strikers, so we know they’ll take care of your hands
